title: Mark Levin Audio Rewind - 7/3/20
description:
On Friday's Mark Levin Show, WPHT Host Rich Zeoli fills in. President Trump is heading to South Dakota for a speech at Mount Rushmore. However the liberals are making it a debate over masks - an argument that wasn't posed during the riots. Then, the Trump campaign has released a new ad highlighting the consequences of defunding the police. We The People don't want to abolish the police. Later, Peter Navarro, White House Trade Advisor, set the record straight on China's nefarious activity and the media's attacks on the President's mask use. In fact, many masks coming from China don't meet the standards that American healthcare professionals require.The United States cannot let China hold America's health or future in their hands.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
